Package ohos.miscservices.wallpaper

Class WallpaperController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.miscservices.wallpaper.WallpaperController

  • public class WallpaperController
extends Object
    Provides the access to the wallpaper management service.
    Since:
    3

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int WALLPAPER_LOCK
      Indicates the lock screen wallpaper.
      static int WALLPAPER_SYSTEM
      Indicates the home screen wallpaper.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static WallpaperController getInstance​(Context context)
        Obtains a WallpaperController instance.
        Parameters:
        context - Indicates the application context. If this parameter is invalid, your application cannot access the wallpaper management service.
        Returns:
        Returns the WallpaperController instance.
        Since:
        3

      • registerColorsChangedListener

        public void registerColorsChangedListener​(IWallpaperColorsChangedListener listener)
        Registers a listener for wallpaper color changes to receive notifications about the changes.
        Parameters:
        listener - Indicates the listener for wallpaper color changes. The caller can customize follow-up operations when your application is notified of the changes.
        Since:
        3

      • unregisterColorsChangedListener

        public void unregisterColorsChangedListener​(IWallpaperColorsChangedListener listener)
        Unregisters a listener for wallpaper color changes.
        Parameters:
        listener - Indicates the listener to unregister.
        Since:
        3

      • getMinHeight

        public int getMinHeight​()
        Obtains the minimum height of the wallpaper. You should call this method before WallpaperController#setWallpaper(PixelMap, int) and WallpaperController#setWallpaper(InputStream, int).
        Returns:
        Returns the minimum height, in pixels; returns 0 if no wallpaper has been set. In this case, you should use the default height.
        Since:
        3

      • getMinWidth

        public int getMinWidth​()
        Obtains the minimum width of the wallpaper. You should call this method before WallpaperController#setWallpaper(PixelMap, int) and WallpaperController#setWallpaper(InputStream, int).
        Returns:
        Returns the minimum width, in pixels; returns 0 if no wallpaper has been set. In this case, you should use the default width.
        Since:
        3

      • isChangePermitted

        public boolean isChangePermitted​()
        Checks whether to allow the application to change the wallpaper for the current user.
        Returns:
        Returns true if the application is allowed to set a wallpaper for the current user; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • isOperationAllowed

        public boolean isOperationAllowed​()
        Checks whether a user is allowed to set wallpapers.
        Returns:
        Returns true if a user is allowed to set wallpapers; returns false otherwise.
        Since:
        3

      • getId

        public int getId​(int wallpaperType)
        Obtains the ID of the wallpaper of the specified type.

        The ID of a wallpaper changes each time the wallpaper is set. You can call this method to know whether the wallpaper has changed.

        Parameters:
        wallpaperType - Indicates the type of the wallpaper whose ID will be returned. The value can be WALLPAPER_SYSTEM or WALLPAPER_LOCK.
        Returns:
        Returns an integer greater than or equal to 0 representing the wallpaper ID if the specified type of wallpaper has been set; returns -1 otherwise. The return value is an integer ranging from -1 to 2^31 - 1.
        Since:
        3

      • setWallpaper

        public void setWallpaper​(PixelMap pixelMap,
                         int wallpaperType)
        Sets a wallpaper of the specified type based on the pixel map of a PNG file. Calling this method requires the SystemPermission#SET_WALLPAPER permission.
        Parameters:
        pixelMap - Indicates the pixel map of the PNG file.
        wallpaperType - Indicates the wallpaper type. The value can be WALLPAPER_SYSTEM or WALLPAPER_LOCK.
        Since:
        3

      • setWallpaper

        public void setWallpaper​(InputStream inputStream,
                         int wallpaperType)
        Sets a wallpaper of the specified type based on the data stream from a JPEG or PNG file. Calling this method requires the SystemPermission#SET_WALLPAPER permission.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - Indicates the data stream from a JPEG or PNG file.
        wallpaperType - Indicates the wallpaper type. The value can be WALLPAPER_SYSTEM or WALLPAPER_LOCK.
        Since:
        3

      • getFile

        public FileDescriptor getFile​(int wallpaperType)
        Obtains a file descriptor to the wallpaper of the specified type. After the file is accessed, the file descriptor needs to be closed.

        Calling this method requires the SystemPermission#GET_WALLPAPER and SystemPermission#READ_USER_STORAGE permissions.

        Parameters:
        wallpaperType - Indicates the wallpaper type. The value can be WALLPAPER_SYSTEM or WALLPAPER_LOCK.
        Returns:
        Returns the file descriptor if the wallpaper of the specified type has been set; returns null if no wallpaper of the specified type is set, or the application does not have the permission to access the wallpaper.
        Since:
        3

      • reset

        public void reset​(int wallpaperType)
        Removes a wallpaper of the specified type and restores the default one.

        Calling this method requires the SystemPermission#SET_WALLPAPER permission.

        Parameters:
        wallpaperType - Indicates the wallpaper type. The value can be WALLPAPER_SYSTEM or WALLPAPER_LOCK.
        Since:
        3

      • setPadding

        public void setPadding​(Rect padding)
        Sets wallpaper padding that exceeds the display area.

        Calling this method requires the SystemPermission#SET_WALLPAPER_DIMENSION permission.

        Parameters:
        padding - Indicates the number of additional pixels outside of the display on left, right, top, and bottom sides of the wallpaper.
        Since:
        3

      • getColors

        public WallpaperColorsCollection getColors​(int wallpaperType)
        Obtains the WallpaperColorsCollection instance for the wallpaper of the specified type.
        Parameters:
        wallpaperType - Indicates the wallpaper type. The value can be WALLPAPER_SYSTEM or WALLPAPER_LOCK.
        Returns:
        Returns the WallpaperColorsCollection instance if any; returns null if a color is unknown.
        Since:
        3

      • getDefaultElement

        public Element getDefaultElement​(int outWidth,
                                 int outHeight,
                                 boolean scaleToFit,
                                 float horizontalAlignment,
                                 float verticalAlignment,
                                 int wallpaperType)
        Obtains the Element instance of the default built-in static wallpaper.
        Parameters:
        outWidth - Indicates the width of the Element instance.
        outHeight - Indicates the height of the Element instance.
        scaleToFit - Specifies whether the wallpaper can be scaled. Value true indicates that the wallpaper can be scaled and cropped to fit the screen, and false indicates that the wallpaper can be cropped only.
        horizontalAlignment - Indicates the horizontal alignment mode. The value ranges from 0 to 1. Value 0 indicates left alignment, 0.5 indicates center alignment, and 1 indicates right alignment.
        verticalAlignment - Indicates the vertical alignment mode. The value ranges from 0 to 1. Value 0 indicates top alignment, 0.5 indicates center alignment, and 1 indicates bottom alignment.
        wallpaperType - Indicates the wallpaper type. The value can be WALLPAPER_SYSTEM or WALLPAPER_LOCK.
        Returns:
        Returns the Element instance of the default built-in static wallpaper.
        Since:
        3

      • getElement

        public Element getElement​()
        Obtains the Element instance of the current system wallpaper.
        Returns:
        Returns the Element instance of the current system wallpaper; returns the default built-in static wallpaper if no wallpaper is set; returns null if any of the following occurs:

        • No system wallpaper is available.
        • The user does not have the permission to operate the wallpaper.
        • Your application does not have the permission to operate the wallpaper.
        Since:
        3
